experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.company: Research Center of the Egyptian Ministry of Defense
experience.description: Build radars GUI app using electron js, vue js, node js receive data from sockets and display it in-app, make high-performance queries to MySQL database and display it inapp, store data in MongoDB, build ci/cd pipeline using gitlab ci/cd, build docker images manage Linux servers and troubleshoot problems, build some background servers usibuildng python and node js, using leaflet js to display maps and data in the app using redis as cache server and event-driven server(using pub/sub)

projects.name: Chief restaurant
projects.description: Chief restaurant is a web app that allows the user to order food from the restaurant, the user can see the menu, add items to the cart, and make an order, the admin can manage the menu, orders, and users, the project contains 2 parts the first part is the front-end part that is built using Vue js, and the second part is the back-end part that is built using laravel, mysql

projects.name: Implementing a simple WebSockets Server & chat app using php native
projects.description: This project is a simple example of how to implement a WebSockets server using PHP native, the project contains a simple chat app that allows users to send messages to each other in real-time.

projects.name: Websocket Microservices With Redis Pubsub
projects.description: This project is a simple example of how to use Websocket with microservices architecture using Redis Pub/Sub, the project contains 3 services, the first service is the main service that has the websocket server, the second service is the publisher service that publishes the message to the Redis channel, and the third service is the subscriber service that subscribes to the Redis channel and sends the message to the main service.
